text: The coconut rice is fragrant and cooked perfectly. However, the dining experience was let down by the service. From the cashier to the kitchen staff, the attitude was noticeably rude and unwelcoming. It really affects the overall experience. I believe the staff either need proper training in customer service or perhaps better remuneration to reflect their hard work. Great food deserves equally great service.

One of the best nasi lemak I have tried so far. The rice fragrance is definitely thumbs up, and not lumpy or sticky.

Worth the trip but limited seats in the restaurant.
Had been coming here for nasi lemak for many years now as we love their fragrant coconut rice, chicken wings, curry vegetables and many other side dishes!
Nice comfortable environment for having a local dish. The chicken wing, otah, curry vegetables and chili I had all tick the boxes. It was not crowded during weekday lunch when I visited.

Aug 2023: so so only. Had better Nasi Lemak before. Good for just trying once or with tourists.

Apr 2025: about 2 years since last visit and I guess will be another 2 years if any. Was craving for nasi lemak and my favourite stall at Tiong Bahru was closed as the TB market was closed for renovation. Dishes were so so only but I must say that brinjal was good.
